com.example.yunita.tradiogc.user

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.yunita.tradiogc.user.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller handles users in the application and webserver.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UserController.GetUserLoginThread
      Called when the login user's information needs to be updated.
      class  UserController.UpdateUserThread
      Called when the login user's information needs to be updated into the webserver.

    • Method Detail

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(User user)
        Called when "Update User Thread" is running.

        This method is used to update the login user's information into the webserver.

        Parameters:
        user - login user

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the login user's information from the webserver.
        Parameters:
        username - login user's username

      • getAllUsers

        public Users getAllUsers(java.lang.String field)
        Gets users that partially match the specified search string. If the search does not specify fields, it searches all of the fields.
        Parameters:
        field - search string

      • searchStrangers

        public Users searchStrangers(java.lang.String searchString)
        Adds all users who are not the login user or friends into the user list.
        Parameters:
        searchString - search string
        Returns:
        result users that are not the login user or friends of the login user

      • searchUsers

        public Users searchUsers(java.lang.String searchString)
        Adds all users into the user list.
        Parameters:
        searchString - search string
        Returns:
        result list of all users
